name: NPC memo plus
description:
NPC memo plus is tool for RPG designed for NPC / PC status management and scenario data storage.

*Dice roll management and logging (D4, D6, D8, D10, D12, D20, D100 support and can roll 1D to 100D)
*Value management (Ex. HP, MP)
*Status checklist management
*Evernote text import
